PageInfo.Message:
<COL ffdc78>"Emblem Stones"</COL> is equipment
exclusive to each job that can be grown using
"Play Points".

By increasing the Emblem Level, you can obtain
"Emblem Points".

Allocate Emblem Points to each status and further
strengthen your favorite job.

<Crest Inheritance>
When the Emblem level increases, the Crest
embedded in the jewelry can be inherited into the
Emblem.

* <COL ffdc78>The performance of the Emblem
equipped by the Support Pawn will be based on the
performance of the Emblem owned by the
player.</COL>
<COL ffdc78>Also, if it belongs to a job that has
not been unlocked, it cannot exert its
effects.</COL>

For crest inheritance, there is a success rate,
and whether successful or not, the jewelry used as
materials will be destroyed.

By using an item, you can increase the success
rate of crest inheritance.

Also, by using a Golden Gemstone, even if it
fails, the jewelry won't be destroyed and can be
preserved.
